title: Fat-face type suggestions
content:
I’ve been searching for decent typefaces cut in the fat-face style, similar to William Thorowgood’s early explorations.  
Any suggestions?

 [‹ How much do I charge my client???](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232750/http:/www.typophile.com/node/51011 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help Please: Font Generating Question ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232750/http:/www.typophile.com/node/51042 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kolber

comments.content: Maybe there is something you like on [Extra Bold, Ultra Black Fonts: Hit Hard with Heavy Duty Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232750/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/extra-bold-ultra-black-fonts/) (a list Stephen Coles put together for the FontFeed).
